enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
sentences: Economies in Transition (EITs): Delegates met to discuss the draft framework for capacity building in EITs and a proposed draft decision, which had been revised following informal consultations conducted by Slovenia.
A number of paragraphs in the draft framework were bracketed, including several references to the Protocol.

Co-Chair Ashe said Parties' comments and amendments would be taken into consideration when reviewing the framework and draft decision. Developing Countries: VANUATU, on behalf of the LDCs, urged explicit reference to the group's submissions in the revised text as a separate section, to ensure that it provides for the needs of the LDCs.
Due to the lack of time, consideration of the framework for capacity building in developing countries was deferred to the next contact group meeting.
